subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Liu Xiang won the men’s 110-meter hurdles before 45,000 fans in Beijing’s new National Stadium in an Olympic test event. Liu, the defending Olympic and world champion, won in 13.18 seconds. The four-day China Open is the first full-scale test for the new site before the Olympics.
